title: The land after relocation of such slum shall be handed over free of cost as the case may be to the respective Municipal Corporation / Public Authority for vital public purpose
clause_text: The land after relocation of such slum shall be handed over free of cost as the case may be to the respective Municipal Corporation / Public Authority for vital public purpose.
